Title: Relates to a study on the impacts of electric vehicles on personal medical devices
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health and the president of the New York state energy research and development authority (NYSERDA) to study and make recommendations on the impacts of electric vehicles on personal medical devices.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the commissioner of health and the president of the New York state energy research and development authority to conduct a study on the impacts of electric vehicles on personal medical devices
